name: Sheppy The Dog: Quest!
description:
Once again, the sheep have escaped and are all around the farm! Help Sheppy on this new, challenging adventure, and guide them safely back to the barn.

In Sheppy the Dog: Quest!, herd flocks of scared sheep to safety while avoiding obstacles, gaining bones by completing quests along the way. Every quest challenges you to replay each level, saving all the sheep as fast as possible to complete objectives and beat your own high score!

Sheppy the Dog: Quest! is a fun and engaging game, with easy to learn but challenging to master gameplay, that joyful atmosphere and hidden fun surprises makes for an entertaining experience for all ages!
